<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/swflibs/TwitchPlayer.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/swflibs/TwitchPlayer.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="channel=automateallthethings&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&videoId=c5687844&device_id=13f3b4292b6e683d"></object><br/>Is this Kerbin’s first dodecapod? This creation by <a href="http://www.twitch.tv/automateallthethings/profile"><strong>AutomateAllTheThings </strong></a>may just be. This clip’s short, but sweet and worth the watch.</p>
Cool! The leg animation must have taken a fair bit of work to program.
